entry.title: Chris joins the lab!
entry.content: Today Chris Grooff joined our lab! They will do an internship focusing on the histone variation in the Fungi.

entry.title: Our germline paper published in Science

link.title: Our germline paper published in Science

entry.content: In this paper, published today in Science, we outline how we made use of the fairy-ring forming mushroom, Marasmius oreades, to show that early germline sequestration takes place in fungi, too!

entry.title: Hanna got an ERC Advanced Grant!

link.title: Hanna got an ERC Advanced Grant!

entry.content: Hanna was awarded 2,5 million EUROS for the study of an early germline sequestration in the basidiomycetes!
entry.summary: Hanna was awarded 2,5 million EUROS for the study of an early germline sequestration in the basidiomycetes!

entry.title: Hanna in Malmö universitets podcast ”Wiki 4-ever”
entry.content: Today, Hanna went to Malmö to join their podcast, in which terms and concepts from Wikipedia are scrutinized. This time the theme was ”fungi” and she was in good company with Pär Halje from Lund.

entry.title: Johannesson lab at Blodomloppet
entry.content: This year we had three runners in our team ”The Sporesquads” running the Blodomloppet: Jesper, Johan and Thibault. Well done!

entry.title: Boel successfully gave her half-time seminar

link.title: Boel successfully gave her half-time seminar

entry.content: Today, Boel gave her half-time seminar with the title: ”How to be a fairy ring”. It was a great presentation and Anna Rosling from Uppsala served as the external expert. Congratulations to Boel and thanks to Anna for the useful discussion!

entry.title: Hanna in a panel discussion
entry.content: Hanna joined an event in Alsike church, in which a panel discussion was organized on the theme of what it implies to be a human. Very interesting discussion with many different perspectives of the topic, from the evolutionary biologist and the nuclear physicist to the bishop…

entry.title: Johannesson lab at the EFPP2025 conference

link.title: Johannesson lab at the EFPP2025 conference

entry.content: Marion and Hanna attended the 14th Conference of the European Foundation for Plant Pathology, hosted by SLU, Uppsala. A nice conference embracing the biology of both agricultural and forest pathogens. Marion gave a talk on the work on Verticillium longisporum!
